00004 typedef struct hash_t {
00005         char *          key;
00006         
00007         data_type       type;         // DATA_* macros can init this
00008         void *          value;        //
00009         size_t          value_size;   //
00010 } hash_t;
00011 
00012 typedef int  (*hash_iterator)(hash_t *, void *, void *);
00013 
00014 #define hash_ptr_null  (void *)-1
00015 #define hash_ptr_end   (void *)-2 
00016 
00017 #define hash_null       {hash_ptr_null, 0, hash_ptr_null, 0}
00018 #define hash_next(hash) {hash_ptr_end,  0, (void *)hash,  0}
00019 #define hash_end        hash_next(NULL)
00020 
00021 #define HVALUE(_hash_t,_type)  *(_type *)_hash_t->value
